description.en:
"I will become emperor and bring peace to the world!"

A vivid depiction of the life of the Byzantine princess Anna Comnena, the only known female historian of the Western Middle Ages!

(Source: Twi4, translated)

Karate girl Seri tries to kick away her past in order to catch a new guy at a singles party, but Tamaki, a childhood flame from her old karate dojo, shows up to show off and makes her heart pound. Their reintroduction leads to a karate challenge, and if Seri loses, she must become Tamaki's "toy"…!? It's a game of love with more rivals and obstacles (and sex!–LOTS of SEX!) than either Seri or Tamaki could have foreseen!
description.pl: Pewnego dnia Seri zostaje zmuszona przez przyjaciół do wzięcia udziału w randce w ciemno. Spotyka na niej swoją dawną, dziecięcą miłość z zajęć karate – Tamakiego. Wkrótce Tamaki i Seri zostają parą, ale wygląda na to, że wszystko wokół chce, by się rozstali.
description.es-la: Seri nunca ha tenido suerte en el amor. Ella lo achaca a su carácter y aficiones, poco propias de una chica, como es el kárate. Deseando tener una vida un poco más normal decide dejar de lado todo aquello que le gusta y acude a una reunión de amigos con la intención de buscar novio. Para su desgracia, en la misma se encuentra con su primer amor, Tamaki, que era el hijo del dueño del dojo donde practicaba kárate y que la conoce perfectamente.

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーアマゾン

description.en:
Amazon, a wild youth in the jungle, is remodeled by the ancient Inca science. With the "Bracelet of Gigi," the key that opens the door to the hidden treasure, on his arm, he protects the treasured ordnance and weaponry, as well as the future of mankind! 

The enemy is Gorgoth, a ten-faced demon who plans to conquer the world with the "Bracelet of Gaga," an opposing key!

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

Kuroto Hinata is searching for his sister, who “once existed” but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, “If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school.”. When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind *Sex & Dungeon*!!___**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
description.id: Si protagonis, Kuroto Hinata, mencari-car adiknya yang seharusnya "pernah ada" tapi kini telah dilupakan semua orang yang ada di sekelilingnya. Dia menerima surat dari murid pindahan cantik, Shiroi Shiuku, yang bertuliskan, "kalo kamu ingin tahu keberadaan adikmu, datanglah ke perpustakaan sepulang sekolah." Saat Kuroto ke perpustakaan, dia menemui Shiroi entah kenapa setengah telanjang menunggu dirinya.
description.ja:
黒戸日向(ルビ：くろどひなた)は“かつて存在した”妹のことを探している。そんな日向のもとに転校生の白井下月(ルビ：しろいしづく)から手紙が届く。

「妹の行方について知りたかったら放課後、図書室まで」

日向は手紙を手に図書室に行くと、そこには半裸の下月が待っていた――。

description.en: My friend's AnlyFons

A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

---
Translated raw sypnosis:

He said, "This world fundamentally should not have demons." And thus, all the lands became peaceful.
description.zh: 他说：“这世上本不该有鬼”。然后，这世间为之一清。（摘自腾漫）

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.zh: 女儿的超能力是把我变帅！

description.en: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...

After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: バックストリートガールズ ～ゴクドルズ～

description.en:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)

Я получил читерские способности в другом мире, и стал экстраординарным в реальном мире~ История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.

Tôi Trở Nên Phi Thường Ngay Cả Ở Thế Giới Thật
Sau Khi Có Được Năng Lực Bá Đạo Ở Dị Giới, Tôi Cũng Vô Đối Ở Thế Giới Thực: Thăng Cấp Xong Thì Cuộc Đời Cũng Thay Đổi

description.en:
Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.
He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.
While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.
Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…

[Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/i-got-a-cheat-skill-in-another-world-and-became-unrivaled-in-the-real-world-too-light-novel)
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

description.en:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.fr:
Un sabre ne doit servir qu'à punir le mal et à protéger les faibles... Aspirant forgeron, Chihiro travaille chaque jour aux côtés de son père. De nature taciturne, il est tout l'opposé de son paternel, un homme qui a toujours le mot pour rire. Ils avaient tout pour vivre heureux... jusqu'à cette terrible tragédie.

Désormais, leur belle relation est tachée de sang, et leur bonheur est à jamais perdu. Consumé par la haine, Chihiro est aujourd'hui animé par une détermination sans faille...
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

description.en:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
description.ru:
Сакамото Рёта — 22-летний безработный, игрок мирового уровня в популярную командную боевку «Btooom!». То, что он при этом сидит на шее у матери, парня не волнует, мыслями он всецело в виртуальном мире, где крут, беспощаден и неотразим. Только в наше время до виртуальной реальности далеко — в этом Рёта убедился на своей шкуре, очнувшись в джунглях, крепко избитый, с чужой сумкой и полным сумбуром в голове. В общем, вышло так, что чья-то злая воля закинула на необитаемый остров несколько десятков игроков и предложила им сразиться в «Btooom!» вживую и по-крупному. Без оружия, без доспехов — только ручные бомбы, собственные тела и гражданская одежда. Как говорится — естественный отбор!  
  
Но истинного игрока королевской битвой смутить сложно, особенно когда на кону собственная жизнь. Так что вскоре Рёта отбросил интеллигентские сопли и приготовился, как не столь далекие предки, жить по принципу «или ты, или тебя». Главное — выжить, а там уже можно пофилософствовать о смысле бытия и вдоволь поспорить с сердечной подругой Химико — за что им досталась такая участь? Как говорят: не согрешишь — не покаешься, не покаешься — не спасешься. А еще на острове можно повидать новые места, насладиться прекрасной природой, встретить много интересных людей… и убить их!  
  


---

description.en:
After he’s killed by the righteous leader of his own guild, Woojin gets a chance to start over. This time he’s not interested in saving the world from monsters — he’s got his sights set on revenge! 

His high-level kills quickly garner him notoriety among the game plebs, while boosting his stats as he masterminds his way closer to the top. But there's something no one can figure out: whose side he’s playing for. 

Now that he knows how to play to win, Woojin will stop at nothing to destroy the hero!
description.ja:
ある日、世界はゲームのように変わってしまった。 世界各地に「ダンジョン」が現れそこから「モンスター」が溢れ、特別な力を持つ「プレイヤー」が登場した。 孤独に生きていたウジンはメシアギルドのマスター・セジュンに出会い、初めて仲間たちと希望を持てるようになった。 しかし、彼の本当の姿は英雄ではなかった… 裏切られ殺されたウジンが目覚めるとそこはそこは自分が「プレイヤー」として覚醒する前の過去だった。 復讐のため「暗黒世界の代理者」の力を得て次々とレベルアップしていくき… 新たなダークヒーローがここに誕生する！

description.ko:
어느 날, 세상이 게임처럼 변해버렸다.
도시 한복판에 '던전'과 '몬스터'가 출몰했고,
신들의 권능을 받은 '플레이어'들이 등장했다. 

 이세준. 세상을 구원할 메시아 길드의 수장.
"저와 함께 세상을 구합시다. 이 악몽에 종지부를 찍읍시다."
영웅의 등장에 온 세상이 열광했고,
나는 그의 동료가 되었다. 

 하지만……

 인류가 구세주로 떠받들던 그는 영웅이 아니라,
세상을 지배하고자 야욕을 품었던 간웅이었다.
“그동안 수고했다. 네가 아니었다면 여기까지 올 수 없었겠지.”
최후의 던전에서 나는 그 놈의 칼에 목숨을 잃었다.

 …라고 생각했다.

 죽음의 순간, 내 귓가에 들려온 알림음.
[게임을 시작합니다.]
나는 플레이어로 각성하기 전의 과거로 되돌아 왔다.

 그리고 이제는, 내가 놈을……

 '사냥' 할 차례다.

---

description.ru:
Этот мир не был милосерден, и я отвечал ему столь же искренней ненавистью. Когда он стал Игрой, для меня не изменилось ничего. Однако встреча с Ли Сэ-Чжуном – героем, Воином, членом самой почитаемой из гильдий – дала мне дом, товарищей и смысл жизни. Смыслом этим стало – уничтожить эти чертовы подземелья и закончить Игру! Я умер от меча в спину. От меча того, кому верил, у врат последнего подземелья… Теперь я вернулся и знаю точно, кто станет добычей «охотничьего пса» Ким У-Джина, чего бы мне это ни стоило!

description.en:
Divinity x Sacrifice
A nonhuman marriage that mends a frozen heart.

"No matter where you are, if your life is meaningless..."

Rita is a lonely boy who was chosen to be the dragon's bride according to village tradition.
The existence of snowy mountain dragons, which has been passed down since ancient times, is now nothing more than a legend.  However, Rita cannot find a role in the village.  He accepts being sacrificed, even though he realizes it's a lie.

The one who saved Rita, who was wandering through a blizzard looking for the dragon and about to die, was Ignat, a beautiful dragon in human form.

Rita's eyes sparkle as she realizes that she was able to fulfill her role as a bride because of the presence of the dragon.  However, Ignat declares, ``I don't need a bride.''  Still unable to give up, Rita learns the secret of the ritual that transforms humans into dragons.

Silent dragon x fearless sacrifice
A fantasy BL about a non-human marriage that will soothe your frozen heart!

There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)

description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

altTitles.fr: L'amour vient après la conquête du monde

description.en:
In the eyes of the public, Fudou Aikawa and Desumi Magahara are sworn enemies who have nothing in common. Fudou, also known as “Red Gelato,” is the leader of the hero squadron “Gelato 5,” whose mission is to bring about world peace. On the other hand, Desumi is the minion leader of “Gecko,” a villainous organization seeking world domination. However, despite these differences, their relationship is not quite what it seems. When they are not making a show of being at each other’s throats, Desumi and Fudou continue to pursue a forbidden love.

Going on dates, baking sweets for one another, and meeting up as often as they can despite their hectic schedules, the two inexperienced lovebirds pave the way for their own unique relationship. Though their public lives are worlds apart, Fudou and Desumi will stop at nothing to make their seemingly impossible romance work.
description.ja: 【説明しよう！】世界平和を目指すヒーロー戦隊「ジェラート５（ファイブ）」のリーダー、相川不動（あいかわふどう）と、世界征服を目論む秘密結社「ゲッコー」の戦闘員リーダー、禍原デス美（まがはらですみ）…二人の間には組織の壁を越えた深い“因縁”があったのだ…!!
description.pt-br:
Aos olhos do público, Fudou Aikawa e Desumi Magahara são inimigos jurados que não têm nada em comum. Fudou, também conhecido como “Red Gelato”, é o líder do esquadrão de heróis “Gelato 5”, cuja missão é trazer a paz mundial. Por outro lado, Desumi é a líder dos lacaios de “Gecko”, uma organização vil que busca dominar o mundo. No entanto, apesar dessas diferenças, o relacionamento deles não é exatamente o que parece. Quando eles não estão fingindo estar na garganta um do outro, Desumi e Fudou continuam perseguindo um amor proibido , saindo para encontros, fazendo doces um para o outro e encontrando-se sempre que podem, apesar de suas agendas lotadas, os dois pombinhos inexperientes abrem caminho para seu relacionamento único. Embora suas vidas públicas sejam de mundos separados, Fudou e Desumi não vão parar por nada para fazer seu romance aparentemente impossível funcionar.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again
Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.

description.en: When high school student Shinozaki confesses his feelings to the beautiful and aloof class representative, Akiho Kosaka, the last thing he expected was for her to say "yes." Like everything else in her diligent life, Kosaka takes dating quite seriously. In an effort to be a good girlfriend, Kosaka decides to meticulously study (and bluntly suggest) all manner of ways to keep Shinozaki sexually satisfied in the theoretical sense, that is. This innocently lewd relationship is only just the beginning.
description.fr: Après que Shinozaki Haruka se soit déclaré à la déléguée, Kousaka Akiho, il se rend compte que cette élève modèle en apparence risque d’être plus compliquée à gérer qu’il ne l’aurait pensé!
description.ja: 「では、手始めに“性交渉”の予定日を決めましょうか。」憧れのクラスメイトに告白した篠崎は、意外にもOKの返事をもらう。だが、彼女は予想外のズレっぷりを発揮する処女ビッチで…!?
description.pt: Depois que o Shinozaki Haruka se confessou para a Representante de Classe, Kousaka Akiho, ele começa à compreender que aquela representante perfeita pode ser um pouco difícil de se lidar!
description.ru: После того, как Шинодзаки Харука признается в любви Косаке Акихо, (спортсменке, красавице и просто старосте класса), которую он просто боготворил, та сразу же соглашается с ним встречаться. Вот только Харука не ожидал узнать кое-что, что изрядно покоробило его представления о своем кумире…

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!
description.ja: 高校入学を機に、初恋の幼馴染・河流と再会した少年・望月。入学早々、学園の高嶺の花となった河流にぎくしゃくしてしまう望月だが、とある事件をきっかけに彼女の「秘密」を知ってしまい――!?
description.pt-br: A vida escolar de Mochizuki tomou um rumo interessante repentinamente quando ele reencontrou sua amiga de infância, Tsukimi Kawaru, por quem ele tinha uma queda desde o ensino fundamental. Por um acidente do destino, ele descobriu que Kawaru era na verdade uma garota-lobo, que não conseguia se controlar perto dele. Como Kawaru quebrou sua promessa de se manter sob controle, sua irmã, Utsuru, decidiu levá-la de volta para casa, mas Mochizuki não gostou dessa ideia e elaborou uma solução para permitir que Kawaru continuasse frequentando o ensino médio enquanto mantinha sua identidade em segredo...

description.en:
Lim Sejun, who likes to eat, is fat and has a large physique. He has high self-esteem and a firm personality that doesn't even care about being teased for being fat. He has only one friend, 'Seo Hajin'. She has always been learning Jiujitsu to protect Sejun since childhood. 

One day, Sejun has trouble with a delinquent in the same class, and Hajin sees it and destroys that delinquent. But one night, Hajin is found severely beaten and suffers from a badly injured knee and more serious psychological trauma. Sejun tries to tell the police, but when the investigation doesn't make much progress, he can't control his anger and goes to find the culprit himself, but he's defeated by the delinquent who learned Jiujitsu and finds nothing. Then he learns Jiujitsu from a man named 'Jason' who saved him. 

Three months later, Sejun, who learned Jiujitsu and lost weight, finds out that a veiled group is involved, and wants to destroy it. A school action drama depicting individual revenge.
description.ko:
평소 먹는 것을 좋아해 뚱뚱하고 큰 체격을 가진 '임세준'.
그는 뚱보라는 놀림에도 신경 쓰지 않는
자존감이 높고 확고한 성격을 가졌다.

그에게 단 한 명의 친구 '서하진'.
그녀는 어릴 적부터 세준을 지켜주기 위해 늘 운동을 배워왔다.

어느 날 세준은 같은 반 일진과 트러블이 생기고
그것을 본 하진은 눈이 돌아가 일진을 박살 내게 된다.

그런데 어느 날 밤 하진은 심하게 폭행당한 채로 발견되고
크게 다친 무릎과 더 심각한 정신적 후유증을 얻는다.

세준은 경찰에게 말해보지만 수사에 별 진척이 없자
분노를 주체하지 못하고 직접 범인을 찾아 나서지만
주짓수를 배운 일진에게 패배하고 아무것도 알아내지 못한다.

그리곤 그를 구해준 '제이슨'이라는 사람에게
주짓수를 배우게 되는데, 
그렇게 3개월, 운동을 배우고 살을 뺀 세준은 일진들을 쓰러뜨려가며 
베일에 싸인 한 단체가 연루되어있다는 사실을 알게 되고,
그 뿌리까지 모조리 뽑아버리려 한다.

개인의 복수를 그리는 학원 액션 드라마.
description.ru:
Лим Се Джун, обладающий крупным телосложением, толстяк, обожающий вкусно поесть. У него высокая самооценка и твердый характер, и его не волнует, что его дразнят и обзывают толстяком. У него есть только один друг - Со Ха Джин. С самого детства она изучает джиу-джитсу, чтобы защитить Се Джуна. Однажды Ха Джин увидела, что у него проблемы с одним из одноклассников, и побила его. 
А дальше... Вы узнаете, прочитав данное произведение.

description.en: A newly emerging religion with a mysterious purpose, "Ilgakgyo," and its educational facility called "Lumbini". The children of Lumbini refer to it as paradise. In this unbelievable paradise where strange events unfold, and the shocking occult thriller experienced by the protagonist "Yeongdo," who finds himself there.

All that matters to 15-year-old Nobara Sumiyoshi is volleyball–she's an awesome player with big-time ambitions. But sometimes it seems like a girl just can't get a break in the competitive world of high school volleyball.  
Nobara's family wants her to inherit the role of "young mistress," serving rich patrons at her family's old-fashioned Japanese restaurant. No thanks! When Nobara transfers to Crimson Field High School, known for its top-notch volleyball team, it turns out that her mother will stoop to dirty tricks to keep her off the court. With assistance from her feisty Aunt Momoko, who's got some connections at Crimson Field, Nobara decides to start playing offense.

title.en: The Two Faces of Misaki Hoshino

altTitles.tl: Hoshino, Ipikit Mo Ang Mga Mata Mo

altTitles.th: เปลี่ยนยัยหน้าจืดเป็นสาวป๊อป

description.en: Kobayakawa is an unsocial student who lives an extraordinarily ordinary life. His only talent is painting portraits, which he often does to relieve pent-up anger. One day, he meets a pretty and popular girl named Hoshino who has a secret that nobody knows except for her and her childhood friend. That is, until he stumbles upon it too by chance. Her friend had been putting make-up on her every day. Now it's his turn to keep this secret and help maintain her social life!

altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
description.ja: 実の娘とセックスをした――もちろん夢の中で。大学講師の後藤は幸福な家庭を築いていた。美しい画家の妻、可愛く優秀な子供たち‥‥しかし、その幸福はハリボテだった。昼には妻の不貞を疑い、夜は悪夢に悩まされる日々の中で後藤の精神は擦り切れていく。そんなある日、帰宅した後藤が見たのは荒らされた自室で涙を流す娘の姿。妻の犯行と確信した後藤は大切な家族を自分が守ると決意するが‥‥!?
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.th: กุหลาบแวร์ซายส์

altTitles.de: Lady Oscar: Die Rose von Versaille

description.en:
In 1755, in three European countries, three people are born who will eventually have a fateful meeting in Versailles, France. 

Hans Axel von Fersen, born the eldest son of a Swedish senator; Oscar François de Jarge, born the youngest daughter of a French general; and Marie Antoinette, born the princess of Austria and the Habsburgs! 

The great masterpiece that shines in the history of Shojo Manga is finally here!

Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
description.ru: Ночь — феномен, некогда считавшийся природной катастрофой. Под угрозой уничтожения от не пойми чего, дети вознесли богам свои молитвы в форме танца, чтобы одолжить их силу, сдержать ярость Ночи и возродить мир из руин. По велению судьбы Дзин, парнишка из захолустного японского городка, встречает Гао, британского солдата, вынужденного покинуть свою страну из-за Ночи. Вдвоём они безмятежно проводили время вместе с друзьями в тихом городке в окружении природы. Пока однажды Ночь вновь не обрушилась на них!

title.en: [Pakupaku desu wa] Tsuihousareta Ojou-sama no "Monster wo Taberu Hodo Tsuyoku Naru" Skill wa, 1-shoku de 1 Level Up suru Zendaimimon no Saikyou Skill deshita. 3-nichi de Jinrui Saikyou ni narimashita wa~!

altTitles.ja: 【パクパクですわ】追放されたお嬢様の『モンスターを食べるほど強くなる』スキルは、１食で１レベルアップする前代未聞の最強スキルでした。３日で人類最強になりましたわ～！

altTitles.en: [Munching Away] The Exiled Young Lady's Skill of "Becoming Stronger by Eating Monsters" was an Unprecedented Strongest Skill Where she Levels Up with Every Meal. She Became the Strongest in Humanity in Three Days!

description.en: Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a 「Gift」 known as 「Monster Eater」, which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because 'eating monsters is vulgar!' Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!
description.ja: 侯爵令嬢・シャーロットは、モンスターを美味しく食べられる「モンスターイーター」という“ギフト”を授かった。けれど「モンスターを食べるなど下品だ！」と実家を追放された彼女は、冒険の旅に出ることになる。そして、最強の存在へと至るのであった……！！

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

description.en:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

title.en: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?

altTitles.ru: И почему мужчины не ходят на каблуках?

description.en: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?
description.pt-br: Kim Manseok é um cara comum, mas com um hobby em particular: seu amor por saltos altos de alta qualidade. Ele possui seu próprio blog pessoal e é conhecido como mulher online, mas um dia sua identidade é exposta! Ele será capaz de continuar sua vida como um assalariado comum?

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hiiragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Taiyo Enomoto. Tsukino is slightly taken back by Taiyo, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she cannot hear. When she carefully reads the shape of his mouth, she finds that he is actually saying nothing but nonsense...?
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。よくよく口の形を読んでみると、実はしょーもないことしか言ってなくないこの人…？
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

title.en: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

altTitles.ja-ro: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

altTitles.ja: 先生と生徒は、愛を知らない。

description.en: “The person I loved the most in the world turned out not to love me at all. I had no choice but to hate that person.” This is a story about two people who don't know how to love and gradually become attracted to each other.
description.ja: いちばん愛されたかった人に、愛されなかった。 いちばん愛されたかった人を、憎むしかなかった。 これは、愛を知らないふたりが、惹かれ合う物語。
description.vi: Người mà tôi yêu thương nhất trên đời hóa ra không hề yêu thương tôi. Tôi lúc này đây không còn cách nào khác ngoài căm ghét chính người ấy. Đây là một câu chuyện giữa hai con người không biết yêu dần thu hút lẫn nhau.

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.
